Text: You don't have to believe in conspiracy theories to realize the world is overpopulated now and there needs to be zero growth. The planet's resources are limited. Better to control population growth and improve quality of life. What's so shocking about that?

An essay detailing the factions and coalitions loosely involved in sinking the mere notion that we may in fact live on a finite planet since Club of Rome's initial publication of Limits to Growth in the early 70s:

http://europe.theoildrum.com/node/3551
